text: @mattgaetz I agree that this insane couple perfectly represents many of you. Paranoid, psychotic, trigger happy, racist, rich & entitled. But its not ALL of you. There are others who have lost loved ones to covid19, lost jobs, facing eviction, want peace or are families of these guys 👇🏽 https://t.co/tFxfOHUgt8
